preQuestData.name: Strange Mojo
preQuestData.tooltip:
Strange Mojo

Deliver the Strange Mojo to Hexxer Ubungo at The Argent Stand.

preQuestData.name: Precious Elemental Fluids
preQuestData.tooltip:
Precious Elemental Fluids

Hexxer Ubungo at The Argent Stand wants you to acquire 3 Precious Elemental Fluids.

Requirements:
- Precious Elemental Fluids x 3

preQuestData.name: Mushroom Mixer
preQuestData.tooltip:
Mushroom Mixer

Collect 10 Muddlecap Fungus and deliver them to Hexxer Ubungo at The Argent Stand.

Requirements:
- Muddlecap Fungus x 10

preQuestData.name: Too Much of a Good Thing
preQuestData.tooltip:
Too Much of a Good Thing

Slay the Muddled Prophet of Sseratus and then return to Hexxer Ubungo at The Argent Stand.

Requirements:
- Muddled Prophet of Sseratus

preQuestData.name: To the Witch Doctor
preQuestData.tooltip:
To the Witch Doctor

Speak with Witch Doctor Khufu at Zim'Torga.

preQuestData.name: Breaking Through Jin'Alai
preQuestData.tooltip:
Breaking Through Jin'Alai

Witch Doctor Khufu at Zim'Torga has asked you to disturb the Blue Cauldron, Green Cauldron, Purple Cauldron, and Red Cauldron.

Requirements:
- Blue Cauldron disturbed
- Green Cauldron disturbed
- Purple Cauldron disturbed
- Red Cauldron disturbed

preQuestData.name: To Speak With Har'koa
preQuestData.tooltip:
To Speak With Har'koa

Speak with Har'koa at the Altar of Har'koa.

preQuestData.name: But First My Offspring
preQuestData.tooltip:
But First My Offspring

Har'koa has asked you to use her whisker on the corpses of her children to free and resurrect them. Return to her at the Altar of Har'koa when you are done.

Requirements:
- Cursed Offspring of Har'koa resurrected x 7

preQuestData.name: Spirit of Rhunok
preQuestData.tooltip:
Spirit of Rhunok

Speak with the Spirit of Rhunok at the Altar of Rhunok.

preQuestData.name: My Prophet, My Enemy
preQuestData.tooltip:
My Prophet, My Enemy

The Spirit of Rhunok at the Altar of Rhunok has asked you to acquire his Arctic Bear God Mojo.

Requirements:
- Arctic Bear God Mojo

preQuestData.name: An End to the Suffering
preQuestData.tooltip:
An End to the Suffering

The Spirit of Rhunok has asked you to use the Tormentor's Incense to awaken his body. You are then to slay Rhunok using the power that his spirit has imbued you with.

If for some reason you lose the Mojo of Rhunok aura, you can return to the Spirit of Rhunok to have it reapplied.

Requirements:
- Rhunok

preQuestData.name: Back to Har'koa
preQuestData.tooltip:
Back to Har'koa

Speak with Har'koa at the Altar of Har'koa.

preQuestData.name: I Sense a Disturbance
preQuestData.tooltip:
I Sense a Disturbance

Har'koa has asked you to determine what has happened to Quetz'lun. Speak to her to be able to ride one of her children stealthily into the Altar of Quetz'lun.

Return to her at the Altar of Har'koa once you have done so.

Requirements:
-
- Quetz'lun's fate revealed.

preQuestData.name: Preparations for the Underworld
preQuestData.tooltip:
Preparations for the Underworld

Har'koa wants you to collect 8 Sacred Adornments. Deliver them to her at the Altar of Har'koa.

Requirements:
- Sacred Adornment x 8

preQuestData.name: Seek the Wind Serpent Goddess
preQuestData.tooltip:
Seek the Wind Serpent Goddess

Seek Quetz'lun's Spirit at the Altar of Quetz'lun.

preQuestData.name: Setting the Stage
preQuestData.tooltip:
Setting the Stage

Quetz'lun's Spirit has demanded that you collect 10 Underworld Power Fragments. Return to her at the Altar of Quetz'lun only when you have done so.

Requirements:
- Underworld Power Fragment x 10

preQuestData.name: Foundation for Revenge
preQuestData.tooltip:
Foundation for Revenge

Quetz'lun's Spirit has tasked you with the destruction of 12 trolls, either Quetz'lun Worshippers or Serpent-Touched Berserkers, near her Soul Fonts.

Only after you have accomplished this should you return to her at the Altar of Quetz'lun.

Requirements:
- Trolls killed near a Soul Font x 12

preQuestData.name: Hell Hath a Fury
preQuestData.tooltip:
Hell Hath a Fury

Quetz'lun's Spirit at the Altar of Quetz'lun wants you to use Quetz'lun's Hexxing Stick upon High Priest Mu'funu, High Priestess Tua-Tua, and High Priest Hawinni. Once you have done this, slay them.

Requirements:
- High Priest Mu'funu hexed at death
- High Priestess Tua-Tua hexed at death
- High Priest Hawinni hexed at death

preQuestData.name: One Last Thing
preQuestData.tooltip:
One Last Thing

Deliver the Underworld Power Fragments to Har'koa and beseech her for a portion of her spirit. You will still find her at the Altar of Har'koa.

preQuestData.name: Blood of a Dead God
preQuestData.tooltip:
Blood of a Dead God

Har'koa has asked you to collect 7 Blood of Mam'toth. Return them to her at the Altar of Har'koa.

Requirements:
- Blood of Mam'toth x 7

preQuestData.name: You Reap What You Sow
preQuestData.tooltip:
You Reap What You Sow

Slay the Drained Prophet of Quetz'lun and then inform Witch Doctor Khufu at Zim'Torga.

Requirements:
- Drained Prophet of Quetz'lun

preQuestData.name: The Key of Warlord Zol'Maz
preQuestData.tooltip:
The Key of Warlord Zol'Maz

Har'koa at Zim'Torga has asked you to acquire the Key of Warlord Zol'Maz.

Requirements:
- Key of Warlord Zol'Maz

preQuestData.name: Rampage
preQuestData.tooltip:
Rampage

Har'koa at Zim'Torga has asked you to free Akali and then to inform Witch Doctor Khufu at Zim'Torga.

Requirements:
- Akali unfettered from his chains.

preQuestData.name: The Gods Have Spoken
preQuestData.tooltip:
The Gods Have SpokenLevel 77

Deliver the Unblemished Heart of the Guardian and the Gusty Essence of the Warden to Har'koa at Zim'Torga.

Requirements:
- Unblemished Heart of the Guardian
- Gusty Essence of the Warden

preQuestData.name: Convocation at Zol'Heb
preQuestData.tooltip:
Convocation at Zol'HebLevel 78

Har'koa at Zim'Torga has asked you to slay the Prophet of Akali.

Requirements:
- Prophet of Akali

preQuestData.name: Unfinished Business
preQuestData.tooltip:
Unfinished Business

Har'koa wants you to speak with Tol'mar at Dubra'jin.

preQuestData.name: Gal'darah Must Pay
preQuestData.tooltip:
Gal'darah Must PayLevel 78

Tol'mar at Dubra'Jin wants you to slay Gal'darah in Gundrak.

Requirements:
- Gal'darah Slain

quests.name: For Posterity
quests.tooltip:
For PosterityLevel 78

Chronicler Bah'Kini at Dubra'Jin wants you to enter Gundrak and collect 6 Drakkari History Tablets.

Requirements:
- Drakkari History Tablet x 6

preQuestData.name: Just Checkin'
preQuestData.tooltip:
Just Checkin'

To'kini wants you to speak to Bah'kini at Dubra'Jin.
